comments.body: It is strange to me that we "LegalizeToLhlo" while this function is called "LowerLHLOToGPU", I'd expect this to be a pre-requisite?

Yes, you are right. However, the tests contain ```HLO``` operations inside the region of ```LHLO``` operations when it reaches ```LowerLHLOToGPU```.  We decided to avoid duplicating the code in the ```NestedHloRegionsConverter``` since ```createLegalizeToLhloPass```, which implements buffer assignment, is almost identical to ```NestedHloRegionsConverter```. What do you suggest?
